content.p: Like the majority of academic libraries, we charge fines for items which are returned late. If your fines build up to RM20 or more, your library account will be blocked. You will not be able to borrow, renew, or reserve items until the fine is paid The current fine rates for late return of items are as follows: Ordinary loans/ Audio-visual loans/ Interlibrary loans RM1 per day or part of an hour Short-loan restricted bookable RM2 per hour or part of an hour Bookable rooms RM5 per hour or part of an hour Laptops, power and VGA adapters, plasma smart-board and LCD TV devices RM10 per hour or part of an hour There are two ways you can pay for your fines: To pay online, please go to https://epay.nottingham.edu.my/: Please see our contact page for telephone and email contact points.
